title: Which college is better, Arvind Day College or PGDAV of DU? - Quora
tags: Pannalal Girdharlal Dayanand Anglo Vedic, University of Delhi
School of Open Learning, University of Delhi

response.answer_text: Sir it's not Arvind but Sri Aurobindo college. If you have option to choose between PGDAV and Sri Aurobindo college then without any doubt go for PGDAV college. Let me know if you have any doubts.
